meanings.sent1: The bilevel cake had two delicious layers of frosting.
meanings.sent2: The bilevel parking lot had spaces on both the ground floor and the rooftop.
meanings.sent3: The bilevel sandwich looked like a tasty tower of bread and fillings.
meanings.sent4: Her bilevel hairstyle featured short layers on top and longer layers at the bottom.
meanings.sent5: The bilevel staircase made it easy to climb to the second floor of the house.

meanings.definition: A type of housing with two separate living spaces.
meanings.sent1: The bilevel house had an apartment on the lower level.
meanings.sent2: They decided to buy a bilevel home with a rental unit downstairs.
meanings.sent3: Living in a bilevel house felt like having your own mini duplex.
meanings.sent4: The bilevel residence provided privacy for both families living inside.
meanings.sent5: The bilevel property had a cozy living area on each floor.
